what: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
text: Generates various customized color palettes ggplot2

title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
text: palette Character. name color palette use. Options "viridis", "high_contrast", "redblue". viridis_option Character. viridis color palette option use. used palette == "viridis". Default "plasma". See viridis information.

title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
text: function generates color palette specified number colors.

title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
Custom color scales — scale_color_custom
text: Custom scale functions (fill colour/color) ggplot2. discrete == FALSE, custom scale uses viridis color palette. discrete == TRUE, custom color palettes used.

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_custom
code: scale_colour_custom(   discrete = FALSE,   palette = "viridis",   viridis_option = "plasma",   ... )  scale_color_custom(   discrete = FALSE,   palette = "viridis",   viridis_option = "plasma",   ... )  scale_fill_custom(   discrete = FALSE,   palette = "viridis",   viridis_option = "plasma",   ... )

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_custom
text: discrete Logical. TRUE, use discrete color scale. FALSE, use continuous color scale. palette Character. name color palette use. Options "viridis", "high_contrast", "redblue". viridis_option Character. viridis color palette option use. used palette == "viridis". Default "plasma". See viridis information. ... Additional arguments pass ggplot2::discrete_scale() discrete == TRUE viridis::scale_color_viridis() viridis::scale_fill_viridis() discrete == FALSE.

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_custom
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris) +   aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Petal.Length) +   geom_point() +   scale_color_custom(discrete = FALSE)  ggplot(iris) +   aes(x = Sepal.Length, fill = Species) +   geom_density() +   scale_fill_custom(discrete = TRUE)
